sentence: Whats a nature philosophers favorite rap song? thoreau some mo
explanation: Refers to the philosopher Henry David Thoreau and also phonetically suggests throw some more
first_new_sentence: Henry David Thoreau wrote the book Walden that reflects on nature and simple living
second_new_sentence: To truly experience life, one must throw their worries away and focus on the present.

sentence: Why does Santa only come once a year? he only comes once a year
explanation: Refers to Santas annual visit, as well as a colloquial term for sexual ejaculation
first_new_sentence: Christmas is the time when Santa brings gifts to children all around the world
second_new_sentence: While intimacy is an important part of relationships, it cannot be the sole focus of love.

sentence: Actually, I have a vampire joke but I wont tell it to you. because it sucks.
explanation: Refers to the act of sucking (e.g. blood) and also to something that is disappointing or of low quality
first_new_sentence: The process to extract juice from ripe fruit often involves sucking out the liquid
second_new_sentence: Many products on the market today suck in quality and do not deliver on their promises.

sentence: Beer nuts are so dang expensive... luckily deer nuts are just under a buck.
explanation: Refers to the cost (dollars) and also male deer
first_new_sentence: The cost of certain foods can be surprising to customers
second_new_sentence: Male deer are often seen in the wild during mating season.
